title: Herakleia
description: Herakleia or Herakleia  Lynkestis was an ancient city of Macedonia founded by Philip II of Macedon in the middle of the fourth century B.C.

properties.description: 1:1 million scale representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 23959
